      int follow(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String toFollow)
      This function adds userName as a follower of toFollow if and only if toFollow is online.
      int login(java.lang.String uName, RMIClientOP userStub, int port)
      This function completes the login of uName setting his userStub, tcpPort for checking his online status and sending him unread posts and followed users

    • Method Detail

      • follow

        public int follow(java.lang.String userName,
         java.lang.String toFollow)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function adds userName as a follower of toFollow if and only if toFollow is online.
        Specified by:
        follow in interface RMIServerOp
        Parameters:
        userName - the user-name of the user that wants to follow toFollow.
        toFollow - the user-name of the user to be followed.
        Returns:
        0 when the operation is successfully completed, -1 otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - on an error.
        See Also:
        RemoteException

      • login

        public int login(java.lang.String uName,
        RMIClientOP userStub,
        int port)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function completes the login of uName setting his userStub, tcpPort for checking his online status and sending him unread posts and followed users
        Specified by:
        login in interface RMIServerOp
        Parameters:
        uName - the user-name of the user to be logged.
        userStub - the userStub of the user to be logged.
        Returns:
        0 when the operation is successfully completed, -1 otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - on an error.
        See Also:
        RemoteException
